column1: Personally, I think ladies with shaved heads look really cool. If it's something you want to do, I say go for it! Also, you would be totally bypassing the issue of a shortage of hair stylists during a coronavirus lockdown!
I'm fairly sure "Donnie Little Hands" has no clue what COVID19 actually IS! Maybe if he figures out how Drumph Co. can make $$$off of it! LOL!

RT @WV_DHHR: Free #COVID19 testing continues today in Grant, Greenbrier, Hampshire, Hancock, Hardy, Logan & Wood counties.
